SEARCH

Package CAMSv2

package CAMSv2
  • Class
    Description
    Advice
    The Advice class represents a piece of advice and its approval status.
    AllFilter
    The AllFilter implements the ReportFilter interface and represents a filter that includes all students in the input set without any filtering.
    AttendeeFilter
    The AttendeeFilter class implements the ReportFilter interface to filter a set of students based on their roles.
    BaseController<U,V>
    The BaseController is an Abstract class representing a base controller for managing user interactions.
    Camp
    The Camp class represents a camp event with information such as camp details, student lists, inquiries, suggestions, etc.
    CampCommitteeDataBase
    The CampCommitteeDatabase class represents Database manager for Camp Committee Members, handling data loading, writing, and retrieval.
    CampCommitteeMember
    The CampCommitteeMember class represents a Camp Committee Member, extending the Student class.
    CampCommitteeMemberController
    The CampCommitteeMemberController class represents Controller for Camp Committee Member, managing their actions and interactions within the system.
    CampCommitteeMemberView
    The CampCommitteeMemberView class for Camp Committee Members, managing display and user interaction.
    CampInformation
    The CampInformation class represents information about a camp, including its details and committee members.
    CampManager
    The CampManager class is responsible for managing camps and their related operations.
    Cams
     
    CCMAuthenticator
    The CCMAuthenticator class implements the Authenticator interface for CCM (Camp Committee Member) objects.
    CCMFilter
    Implementation of the ReportFilter interface for filtering students who are Camp Committee Members (CCMs).
    DataBase
    The DataBase is an Abstract class representing a database with methods to load data from and write data to a CSV file.
    Enquiries
    The Enquiries class Represents a collection of inquiries made by a specific enquirer.
    EnquiryManager
    The EnquiryManager class Manages the creation and handling of inquiries related to camps.
    GoToMainMenu
    The GoToMainMenu class Represents a boolean value indicating whether to go to the main menu or not.
    IAuthenticator<T>
    The IAuthenticator is an Interface for implementing the specific types of Authentication
    IReportFilter
    The IReportFilter An interface for filtering a list of students based on specific criteria.
    Question
    The Question class represents a question associated with a camp in the CAMSv2 system.
    Reply
    The Reply class represents a reply associated with a question in the CAMSv2 system.
    ReportDatabase
    The ReportDatabase A class responsible for generating various reports and saving them as CSV files.
    Role
    The Role enum represents the roles of users in the CAMSv2 system.
    Staff
    The Staff Represents a staff member in the system, extending the User class.
    StaffAuthenticator
    The StaffAuthenticator class implements the Authenticator interface for Staff objects.
    StaffController
    The Controller class for managing interactions between the Staff user and the system.
    StaffDataBase
    The StaffDataBase Class Manages the data related to staff members, including loading from and writing to a CSV file.
    StaffView
    The StaffView Class represents the view for staff members in the CAMSv2 system, providing methods to display menus and prompts.
    Student
    This Student class represent a Student user registered in the system.
    StudentAuthenticator
    This StudentAuthenticator class implements the Authenticator interface for Student objects.
    StudentController
    This StudentController class represents the controller for the Student model.
    StudentDataBase
    This StudentDataBase class implements the Authenticator interface for Student objects.
    StudentView
    This StudentView class's objects displays student's view
    Suggestion
    The Suggestion class represents a suggestion made by a student, containing the student's name and a list of advice associated with the suggestion.
    SuggestionManager
    Singleton SuggestionManager class responsible for managing Suggestion utility methods.
    User
    The User User class represents a user in the CAMSv2 system.
    UserGroup
    This UserGroup enum represents the different user groups in the system.
    View
    This View An abstract class representing a generic user interface view.
